2277  /**
2278   * An abstract partial {@link Semantics} that permits subtyping.
2279   *
2280   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2281   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2282   */
2283  @Experimental
2284  public static abstract class VariantSemantics extends Semantics {
2285
2286
2287    /*
2288     * Constructors.
2289     */
2290
2291
2292    /**
2293     * Creates a new {@link VariantSemantics}.
2294     */
2295    protected VariantSemantics() {
2296      super();
2297    }
2298
2299
2300    /*
2301     * Instance methods.
2302     */
2303
2304
2305    /**
2306     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
2307     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadClass} is assignable
2308     * to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied {@code
2309     * receiverClass}, according to the assignability rules modeled by
2310     * this {@link Semantics} instance, and if and only if {@code
2311     * payloadClass} models a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not
2312     * any other type, and if and only if {@code receiverClass} models
2313     * a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not any other type.
2314     *
2315     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2316     * method.</p>
2317     *
2318     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if
2319     * {@link Type#supertype(Type)
2320     * receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass)} returns {@code true}.
2321     *
2322     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2323     * receiverClass}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
2324     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
2325     *
2326     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
2327     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2328     *
2329     * @param receiverClass the receiver type as described above; must
2330     * not be {@code null}
2331     *
2332     * @param payloadClass the payload type as described above; must
2333     * not be {@code null}
2334     *
2335     * @return {@code true} if and only if {@link Type#supertype(Type)
2336     * receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass)} returns {@code true}
2337     *
2338     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2339     * idempotent and deterministic.
2340     *
2341     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
2342     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2343     *
2344     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2345     */
2346    @Override
2347    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2348      return receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass);
2349    }
2350
2351    /**
2352     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
2353     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadGenericArrayType} is
2354     * assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the
2355     * supplied {@code receiverGenericArrayType}, according to the
2356     * assignability rules modeled by this {@link Semantics} instance,
2357     * and if and only if {@code payloadGenericArrayType} models a
2358     * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array
2359     * type} and not any other type, and if and only if {@code
2360     * receiverGenericArrayType} models a {@linkplain
2361     * java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array type} and not
2362     * any other type.
2363     *
2364     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2365     * method.</p>
2366     *
2367     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if the
2368     * {@linkplain Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
2369     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
2370     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
2371     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}.</p>
2372     *
2373     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2374     * receiverGenericArrayType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
2375     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
2376     *
2377     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
2378     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2379     *
2380     * @param receiverGenericArrayType the receiver type as described
2381     * above; must not be {@code null}
2382     *
2383     * @param payloadGenericArrayType the payload type as described
2384     * above; must not be {@code null}
2385     *
2386     * @return {@code true} if and only if the {@linkplain
2387     * Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
2388     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
2389     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
2390     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}
2391     *
2392     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2393     * idempotent and deterministic.
2394     *
2395     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
2396     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2397     *
2398     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2399     */
2400    @Override
2401    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
2402                                                                                    final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2403      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
2404    }
2405
2406    final <X> List<? extends Type<X>> condense(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds) {
2407      if (!bounds.isEmpty()) {
2408        final Type<X> firstBound = bounds.get(0);
2409        if (firstBound.named() && firstBound.upperBounded()) {
2410          // it's a type variable
2411          return this.condense(firstBound.upperBounds());
2412        }
2413      }
2414      return bounds;
2415    }
2416
2417  }
2418
2419
2420  /**
2421   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements Java
2422   * type assignability semantics, which are covariant.
2423   *
2424   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2425   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2426   */
2427  @Experimental
2428  public static class CovariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2429
2430
2431    /*
2432     * Constructors.
2433     */
2434
2435
2436    /**
2437     * Creates a new {@link CovariantSemantics}.
2438     */
2439    public CovariantSemantics() {
2440      super();
2441    }
2442
2443
2444    /*
2445     * Instance methods.
2446     */
2447
2448
2449    @Override
2450    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2451      return this.assignable(receiverClass, payloadParameterizedType.type());
2452    }
2453
2454    @Override
2455    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2456      final Type<X> receiverComponentType = receiverClass.componentType();
2457      return
2458        this.assignable(receiverComponentType == null ? receiverClass : receiverComponentType,
2459                        payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
2460    }
2461
2462    @Override
2463    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
2464      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadType.upperBounds()) {
2465        if (this.assignable(receiverType, bound)) {
2466          return true;
2467        }
2468      }
2469      return false;
2470    }
2471
2472    @Override
2473    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2474      // Raw types are assignable and either the payload is a generic
2475      // class (and therefore a raw class) or the payload is a class
2476      // whose parameterized supertypes need to be evaluated.
2477      return
2478        this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadClass) &&
2479        (payloadClass.hasTypeParameters() ||
2480         this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadClass.supertypes()));
2481    }
2482
2483    @Override
2484    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2485                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2486      return this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadParameterizedType.supertypes());
2487    }
2488
2489    private final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2490                                                                          final Iterable<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypes) {
2491      for (final Type<Y> payloadType : payloadTypes) {
2492        if (payloadType.hasTypeArguments() &&
2493            this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(receiverParameterizedType, payloadType)) {
2494          return true;
2495        }
2496      }
2497      return false;
2498    }
2499
2500    private final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2501                                                                                     final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2502      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
2503        final List<? extends Type<X>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2504        final List<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2505        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
2506          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
2507            final Type<X> receiverTypeTypeArgument = receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
2508            final Type<Y> payloadTypeTypeArgument = payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
2509            if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.wildcard() || payloadTypeTypeArgument.wildcard()) {
2510              if (!this.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArgument, payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
2511                return false;
2512              }
2513            } else if (!receiverTypeTypeArgument.represents(payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
2514              return false;
2515            }
2516          }
2517          return true;
2518        }
2519      }
2520      return false;
2521    }
2522
2523    @Override
2524    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2525                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2526      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds()) {
2527        if (this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType, bound)) {
2528          return true;
2529        }
2530      }
2531      return false;
2532    }
2533
2534    @Override
2535    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
2536                                                                         final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2537      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadClass.componentType());
2538    }
2539
2540
2541    @Override
2542    protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
2543                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2544      return receiverTypeVariable.supertype(payloadTypeVariable);
2545    }
2546
2547    @Override
2548    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2549                                                                     final boolean lowerBounded,
2550                                                                     final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2551      return
2552        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadClass) &&
2553        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadClass, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2554    }
2555
2556    @Override
2557    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2558                                                                                 final boolean lowerBounded,
2559                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2560      return
2561        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadParameterizedType) &&
2562        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadParameterizedType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2563    }
2564
2565    @Override
2566    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2567                                                                                final boolean lowerBounded,
2568                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2569      return
2570        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadGenericArrayType) &&
2571        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadGenericArrayType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2572    }
2573
2574    @Override
2575    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2576                                                                            final boolean lowerBounded,
2577                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2578      return
2579        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadTypeVariable) &&
2580        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadTypeVariable, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2581    }
2582
2583    @Override
2584    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2585                                                                            final boolean receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded,
2586                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadWildcardType,
2587                                                                            final boolean payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
2588      final Type<X> receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound = receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0);
2589      if (this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0))) {
2590        if (receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
2591          return
2592            payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded &&
2593            this.assignable(payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0), receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
2594        }
2595        return
2596          !payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded ||
2597          this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
2598      }
2599      return false;
2600    }
2601
2602
2603  }
2604
2605  /**
2606   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that does not permit
2607   * subtyping, but that compares wildcard types covariantly.
2608   *
2609   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2610   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2611   */
2612  @Experimental
2613  public static class InvariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2614
2615
2616    /*
2617     * Instance fields.
2618     */
2619
2620
2621    private final CovariantSemantics wildcardSemantics;
2622
2623
2624    /*
2625     * Constructors.
2626     */
2627
2628
2629    /**
2630     * Creates a new {@link InvariantSemantics}.
2631     */
2632    public InvariantSemantics() {
2633      super();
2634      this.wildcardSemantics = new CovariantSemantics();
2635    }
2636
2637
2638    /*
2639     * Instance methods.
2640     */
2641
2642
2643    @Override // VariantSemantics
2644    public <X, Y> boolean assignable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
2645      if (receiverType.wildcard() || payloadType.wildcard()) {
2646        return this.wildcardSemantics.assignable(receiverType, payloadType);
2647      }
2648      return receiverType.represents(payloadType);
2649    }
2650
2651  }
2652
2653  /**
2654   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements the
2655   * rules of <a
2656   * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
2657   * target="_parent"><em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.
2658   *
2659   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2660   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2661   */
2662  @Experimental
2663  public static class CdiSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2664
2665
2666    /*
2667     * Instance fields.
2668     */
2669
2670
2671    private final CdiTypeArgumentSemantics typeArgumentSemantics;
2672
2673
2674    /*
2675     * Constructors.
2676     */
2677
2678
2679    /**
2680     * Creates a new {@link CdiSemantics}.
2681     */
2682    public CdiSemantics() {
2683      super();
2684      this.typeArgumentSemantics = new CdiTypeArgumentSemantics();
2685    }
2686
2687
2688    /*
2689     * Instance methods.
2690     */
2691
2692
2693    /**
2694     * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
2695     * represents an <em>actual type</em>, which the <a
2696     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#assignable_parameters"
2697     * target="_parent">CDI specification</a> implies, but does not
2698     * explicitly state, is either a class, a parameterized type or a
2699     * generic array type.
2700     *
2701     * <p>Actual types, though not defined, are <a
2702     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
2703     * target="_parent">critically important to CDI's concept of
2704     * <em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.</p>
2705     *
2706     * <p>The concept of an actual type is not mentioned in the <a
2707     * href="https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se17/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.1"
2708     * target="_parent">Java Language Specification</a>.
2709     *
2710     * @param type the {@link Type} in question; must not be {@code
2711     * null}
2712     *
2713     * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
2714     * returns {@code false} from invocations of both its {@link
2715     * #upperBounded()} and {@link #lowerBounded()} methods; {@code
2716     * false} otherwise
2717     *
2718     * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}
2719     *
2720     * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
2721     *
2722     * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by
2723     * multiple threads.
2724     */
2725    public final boolean actualType(final Type<?> type) {
2726      return !type.upperBounded() && !type.lowerBounded();
2727    }
2728
2729    @Convenience
2730    @Override
2731    public final boolean assignable(final java.lang.reflect.Type receiverType,
2732                                    final java.lang.reflect.Type payloadType,
2733                                    final boolean ignoredBox) {
2734      // Boxing is always required in CDI.
2735      return this.assignable(CdiType.of(receiverType), CdiType.of(payloadType));
2736    }
2737
2738    @Override
2739    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass,
2740                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2741      if (receiverClass.represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
2742        for (final Type<Y> payloadTypeTypeArgument : payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
2743          if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
2744            // OK
2745          } else if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
2746            final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds = payloadTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
2747            switch (bounds.size()) {
2748            case 0:
2749              // OK
2750              break;
2751            case 1:
2752              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
2753                return false;
2754              }
2755              break;
2756            default:
2757              return false;
2758            }
2759          } else {
2760            return false;
2761          }
2762        }
2763        return true;
2764      }
2765      return false;
2766    }
2767
2768    @Override
2769    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2770                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2771      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadClass)) {
2772        for (final Type<X> receiverTypeTypeArgument : receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
2773          if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
2774            // OK
2775          } else if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
2776            final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds = receiverTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
2777            switch (bounds.size()) {
2778            case 0:
2779              // OK
2780              break;
2781            case 1:
2782              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
2783                return false;
2784              }
2785              break;
2786            default:
2787              return false;
2788            }
2789          } else {
2790            return false;
2791          }
2792        }
2793        return true;
2794      }
2795      return false;
2796    }
2797
2798    @Override
2799    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2800                                                                                      final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2801      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
2802        final List<? extends Type<X>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2803        final List<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2804        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
2805          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
2806            if (!typeArgumentSemantics.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i), payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i))) {
2807              return false;
2808            }
2809          }
2810          return true;
2811        }
2812      }
2813      return false;
2814    }
2815
2816
2817    /*
2818     * Inner and nested classes.
2819     */
2820
2821
2822    @Experimental
2823    private static class CdiTypeArgumentSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2824
2825      private final CovariantSemantics covariantSemantics;
2826
2827      private CdiTypeArgumentSemantics() {
2828        super();
2829        this.covariantSemantics = new CovariantSemantics();
2830      }
2831
2832      @Override
2833      protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverClass,
2834                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2835        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverClass, payloadTypeVariable);
2836      }
2837
2838      @Override
2839      protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2840                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2841        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverParameterizedType, payloadTypeVariable);
2842      }
2843
2844      @Override
2845      protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
2846                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2847        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverGenericArrayType, payloadTypeVariable);
2848      }
2849
2850      private final <X, Y> boolean actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverActualType,
2851                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2852        // Section 5.2.4 of the CDI specification is mealy-mouthed but
2853        // interpretable:
2854        //
2855        // "…the required type parameter [receiverActualType] is an
2856        // actual type [never defined, but implied by other sentences
2857        // scattered throughout the specification to be either a
2858        // class, parameterized type or generic array type], the bean
2859        // type parameter is a type variable [payloadTypeVariable] and
2860        // the actual type [receiverActualType] is assignable to the
2861        // upper bound[s], if any [there will always be one], of the
2862        // type variable [payloadTypeVariable], or…"
2863        //
2864        // So perhaps somewhat counterintuitively check all the bounds
2865        // of the *payload* and see if the *receiver* is assignable to
2866        // all of them.
2867        for (final Type<Y> bound : this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds())) {
2868          // Note that this is somewhat backwards to what you may expect.
2869          if (!this.covariantSemantics.assignable(bound, receiverActualType)) {
2870            return false;
2871          }
2872        }
2873        return true;
2874      }
2875
2876      @Override
2877      protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
2878                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2879        // Section 5.2.4 again:
2880        //
2881        // "…the required type parameter and the bean type parameter are
2882        // both type variables and the upper bound of the required [receiver]
2883        // type parameter is assignable to the upper bound, if any, of
2884        // the bean [payload] type parameter."
2885        //
2886        // The first of many problems with this:
2887        //
2888        // This is of course ambiguous.  See
2889        // https://issues.redhat.com/browse/CDI-440 which was
2890        // unceremoniously closed for no good reason.
2891        //
2892        // "For example, the bullet
2893        //
2894        // * the required type parameter and the bean type parameter
2895        //   are both type variables and the upper bound of the
2896        //   required type parameter is assignable to the upper bound,
2897        //   if any, of the bean type parameter.
2898        //
2899        // should have meaning similar to:
2900        //
2901        // for each upper bound T of the bean type parameter, there is
2902        // an (at least one) upper bound of the required type which is
2903        // assignable to T."
2904        //
2905        // This is not normal Java/covariant semantics.  In Java, if
2906        // you have two type variables, A extends Object and B extends
2907        // Object, you cannot assign B to A or vice versa.  Here, the
2908        // CDI specification is essentially performing a kind of type
2909        // erasure in this one case.
2910        //
2911        // In CDI, when a type variable is a type argument (by
2912        // definition of a parameterized type), the platform basically
2913        // erases it.  In CDI you cannot have a type-variable-typed
2914        // injection point, because of course you can't predict what
2915        // "value" that injection point's type will have at
2916        // application analysis time.  So it stands to reason that if
2917        // there is a type variable "anywhere in" the injection point
2918        // (as a type argument, say) it will effectively be erased to
2919        // its bounds.
2920        return this.match(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds(), receiverTypeVariable.upperBounds());
2921      }
2922
2923      @Override
2924      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2925                                                                       final boolean lowerBounded,
2926                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2927        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadClass);
2928      }
2929
2930      @Override
2931      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2932                                                                                   final boolean lowerBounded,
2933                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2934        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadParameterizedType);
2935      }
2936
2937      @Override
2938      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2939                                                                                  final boolean lowerBounded,
2940                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2941        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadGenericArrayType);
2942      }
2943
2944      private final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2945                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded,
2946                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadActualType) {
2947        return
2948          (!lowerBounded || this.match(payloadActualType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds())) &&
2949          this.match(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds(), payloadActualType);
2950      }
2951
2952      @Override
2953      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2954                                                                              final boolean lowerBounded,
2955                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2956        final List<? extends Type<Y>> condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds = this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds());
2957        if (!lowerBounded || this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds(), true)) {
2958          final List<? extends Type<X>> condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds = this.condense(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds());
2959          return
2960            this.match(condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false, condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false) ||
2961            this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false);
2962        }
2963        return false;
2964      }
2965
2966      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
2967        return this.match(bound0, bounds1, true);
2968      }
2969
2970      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1, final boolean condense1) {
2971        if (!bounds1.isEmpty()) {
2972          if (condense1) {
2973            bounds1 = this.condense(bounds1);
2974          }
2975          boolean match = false;
2976          for (final Type<?> bound1 : bounds1) {
2977            if (this.covariantSemantics.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
2978              match = true;
2979              break;
2980            }
2981          }
2982          if (!match) {
2983            return false;
2984          }
2985        }
2986        return true;
2987      }
2988
2989      private final <X> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final Type<?> bound1) {
2990        return this.match(bounds0, true, bound1);
2991      }
2992
2993      private final <X> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final boolean condense0, final Type<?> bound1) {
2994        if (!bounds0.isEmpty()) {
2995          if (condense0) {
2996            bounds0 = this.condense(bounds0);
2997          }
2998          boolean match = false;
2999          for (final Type<X> bound0 : bounds0) {
3000            if (this.covariantSemantics.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3001              match = true;
3002              break;
3003            }
3004          }
3005          if (!match) {
3006            return false;
3007          }
3008        }
3009        return true;
3010      }
3011
3012      private final <X, Y> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
3013        return this.match(bounds0, true, bounds1, true);
3014      }
3015
3016      private final <X, Y> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0,
3017                                         final boolean condense0,
3018                                         List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1,
3019                                         final boolean condense1) {
3020        if (!bounds0.isEmpty() && !bounds1.isEmpty()) {
3021          for (final Type<X> bound0 : condense0 ? this.condense(bounds0) : bounds0) {
3022            boolean match = false;
3023            for (final Type<Y> bound1 : condense1 ? this.condense(bounds1) : bounds1) {
3024              if (this.covariantSemantics.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3025                match = true;
3026                break;
3027              }
3028            }
3029            if (!match) {
3030              return false;
3031            }
3032          }
3033        }
3034        return true;
3035      }
3036
3037    }
3038  }
3039}
